title: An adults-only resort in Vermont is perfect for a romantic weekend getaway, according to Yahoo Travel
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Travel Couples can stay in a luxe treehouse with a gas fireplace.
Twin Farms Barnard By Kristi Palma January 20, 2026 | 12:16 PM 1 minute to read An adults-only resort in Vermont is a perfect getaway for couples this Valentine’s Day, according to Yahoo Travel.
The site released a list of 8 romantic weekend getaways and last-minute Valentine’s Day trips for couples and included Twin Farms in Barnard.

title: 19-year-old killed in snowy Maine crash
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News Joamaliz Orozco was driving a Subaru Impreza that reportedly crashed into a guardrail Saturday afternoon, according to police.
By Abby Patkin January 20, 2026 | 11:35 AM 1 minute to read A 19-year-old Connecticut woman died Saturday following a crash on a snowy Maine highway, authorities said.
Maine State Police identified the teen as Joamaliz Orozco, an East Hartford resident.

title: Joe Mazzulla produced another humorous quote when asked about Jayson Tatum’s return timeline

bullets: Morning Sports Update "I failed medical school.
